text: Sabougla Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Sabougla is a name derived from the Choctaw language possibly meaning "smoke". Variant names are "Sabola", "Sabougala", "Sabougla Hatchie River", "Sabula Hatchie", and "Sobola". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Calhoun County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Webster County, Mississippi
title: Sabougla Creek
